publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6251 Anne McLaughlin: Congratulations to GESH—That the Parliament congratulates the Greater Easterhouse Supporting Hands project (GESH) on being shortlisted as one of three finalists for the Scottish Government’s Community Service Award for improving the local community; notes that GESH is run entirely by an army of dedicated volunteers who work tirelessly to make their community a better place; commends the excellent work that they do in helping some of the most disadvantaged communities in Glasgow, and wishes the project every success for the future. Supported by: Rob Gibson*, Bob Doris*, Margaret Mitchell*, Sandra White*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Gil Paterson*, Kenneth Gibson*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-6251 Congratulations to GESH (lodged on 4 May 2010) Stuart McMillan*

S3M-6251Anne McLaughlin:Congratulations to GESH—That the Parliament congratulates the Greater Easterhouse Supporting Hands project (GESH) on being shortlisted as one of three finalists for the Scottish Government’s Community Service Award for improving the local community; notes that GESH is run entirely by an army of dedicated volunteers who work tirelessly to make their community a better place; commends the excellent work that they do in helping some of the most disadvantaged communities in Glasgow, and wishes the project every success for the future. Supported by: Rob Gibson, Bob Doris, Margaret Mitchell, Sandra White, Hugh O’Donnell, Gil Paterson, Kenneth Gibson, Bill Kidd, Stuart McMillan
S3M-6251 Congratulations to GESH (lodged on 4 May 2010) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-6251 Congratulations to GESH (lodged on 4 May 2010) Margaret Curran*
